name: portall
description: Portall is a self-hosted dashboard that displays shortcuts to internal apps, stats, and widgets. Designed for homelab users, it simplifies navigation across multiple services.
features: Service dashboard: Display shortcuts to all your self-hosted services in one place.
Custom widgets: Add widgets for system stats, weather, RSS feeds, and other information.
Link organization: Group services into categories for better organization and navigation.
Status monitoring: Check service availability with health checks and uptime indicators.
Custom icons: Use custom icons and logos for each service for visual identification.
Search functionality: Quickly find services by name with built-in search.
Responsive design: Access dashboard from any device with mobile-optimized layout.
Bookmarklets: Add services easily with browser bookmarklets or manual entry.
Theme customization: Personalize appearance with custom colors, backgrounds, and layouts.
Multi-user support: Create separate dashboards for different users or family members.
Quick launch: Open services in new tabs or windows with single-click access.
Import and export: Backup and restore dashboard configuration with JSON export.
